about_the_game:
"Solving mysteries" and "collecting items"

Recommended only for those who are not interested in such things.

It ’s a game to choose people, so
If you feel that it does not suit you, please do not hesitate to return it.
(Within 2 weeks of purchase, less than 2 hours of use)


Cute cavalry soldiers like toys rampage in mess
An Unprecedented Historical Action Game!

Super Simple Operation Method:
[Mouse / keyboard operation]
Move with the arrow keys on the keyboard (or W (up), S (down), A (left), D (right)),
Aim with the mouse and Left-click to Arrow attack (you can also hold it down) Right-click to Charge ,

[Controller operation]
Move: L stick
Aim: R stick
Bullet firing: R trigger (L trigger is also possible)
→ Operation is only mouse and arrow keys!
I took the plunge and reduced the number of buttons used.

This is very unique game.
→ There is Boss Battle in each area. If you defeat, you'll get the weapon of the Boss!
→ Realistic movements of Enemies, Allies, Bullets, and objects based on physics.


Fly Fly Horse's commitment!
The operation, system, and graphics have been made as simple as possible.

・ Simple Operation & Fixed Camera Angle
Operation is only mouse and arrow keys. The camera angle is fixed to simplify the operation.
→ You should be able to concentrate on movement and attacks by eliminating camera operations.
However, the camera position is adjusted for each stage, depending on the player position.
By sliding the camera automatically, it prevents the front side from becoming invisible.
I also narrowed down the buttons to use.
You can also climb the ramparts and jump from the pyramids with a simple operation. You can also blow off allies.

・ Simple Graphics
Low poly with rough characters and terrain
→ The low-poly gradation shines depending on how the light is applied. I tried many times how to apply light to make it look beautiful.

short_description: Fly Fly Horse is Chaotic Third Person Shooter Action Game! The purpose is to move around the 3D stage set in the Middle Ages and defeat a certain number of Enemies. Accumulate scores and level up, By defeating Boss, you can use Boss's Weapon. Super easy operation with only arrow keys and mouse!
